General.Name: Suzhou Oriental Semiconductor Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Suzhou Oriental Semiconductor Company Limited operates as a semiconductor technology company in China. The company's products include GreenMOS; SGTMOS; IGBT products; and hybrid FET products, as well as SiC devices. Its products are used in SMPS, inverter, motor driver, EV charges, and other applications. Suzhou Oriental Semiconductor Company Limited was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.
